title: Reactivity umpolung (reversal) of ligands in transition metal complexes
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2808-2827
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00979C, Tutorial Review
Robert H. Morris
The power of transition metal ions and their ligands to reverse the native reactivity of small molecules is highlighted by providing examples for 15 classes of ligands including types L, XL, X, X2, and X3.
